title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Very/somewhat negative where Share of respondents is 50.0.
The lowest category is found at Don't know / no answer where Share of respondents is 6.0.
The highest value at Very/somewhat negative is almost 8.33 times larger than the minimum value of Don't know / no answer.
The highest value at Very/somewhat negative is almost 8.33 times larger than the minimum value of Don't know / no answer.
The difference between the max Response Very/somewhat negative and min Response Don't know / no answer is 44.0.
